geronimo-plugin.name: Geronimo Dojo App (jetty)
geronimo-plugin.description: The Dojo AJAX library for Geronimo. This binds to /dojo so that applications needing to add dojo support can simply include a reference to /dojo/dojo.js to enable Dojo support.
geronimo-plugin.author: Dojo Foundation
geronimo-plugin.license: BSD and Academic Free License v2.1

prerequisite.description: This version of the Welcome application works with the Geronimo/Jetty distribution. It is not intended to run in the Geronimo/Jetty distribution. There is a separate version of the Welcome application that works with Jetty. Please install the version appropriate to your Geronimo distribution.
